explains: prep. 尽管，即使；不由自主地，忍不住地
wordGroup: in despite of 尽管；不管
despite all that 尽管如此

sentences.en: Despite our worries everything turned out well.
sentences.cn: 尽管我们都很担心，结果一切都顺利。

sentences.en: Despite his cries, no one came to his assistance.
sentences.cn: 尽管他喊叫，却没有人来帮助他。

sentences.en: Despite being a big star, she's very approachable.
sentences.cn: 她虽然是个大明星，却非常平易近人。
